About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your project is in safe hands

I have been passionate about web development and software engineering for most of my life. I started learning about HTML when I was 12 years old at a computer science summer camp that I was fortunate enough for my parents to send me too. 22 years later I have acquired a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, a Masters Degree in Information Technology and 12 years of professional and personal experience.

Most of my experience has been in working with front end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, AngularJS and ReactJS. I have also done full stack development with Java, NodeJS, .NET and MySQL building SOAP and RESTful web services, mostly. As technology changes, I like to keep my skills up to date by taking online courses on Youtube and Udemy. You can see some of my recent courses below.

In my free time I enjoy playing video games, spending time with my husband and daughter, traveling, cooking and dog training.

Staying updated with HTML and CSS

Analyzing recent frameworks

React, Redux and Firebase

Testimonials

Take a look at what my clients say... (taken from my linked in page)

In her time at Temenos Terra dug in and learned to be super productive in a challenging environment. She stepped up and figured out where she could add value despite these issues. Her ability to work with others and help the team move forward is inspiring to all. I'm hopeful that I will be able to work with her again in the future.

  • Scott Dunbar, Executive Level Technical Leader at Temenos, Denver CO

Terra was a phenomenal instructor. She has a way of taking difficult subjects and breaking them down into understandable language. Her knowledge in a variety of Technologies provides a great resource to students when challenges in projects arise. She is also tremendously talented in fixing bugs that occur due to not so obvious reasons.

  • Samantha (Johnston) Osei Asibey, Encompass Helpdesk at Universal Lending, Denver, CO

Terra is an extremely capable teacher. An expert in full-stack web development, Terra is adept at distilling difficult concepts into manageable bites for her students. Furthermore, Terra is skilled at fostering an environment in which students are challenged to dive deeper into the subject matter and make discoveries for themselves. In addition, Terra is incredibly patient, always willing to review subject matter at the student's request. Terra's combination of both real-word experience and technical expertise make her an incredible effective teacher.

  • Peter Almon, Senior Frontend React Developer at Ally, Charlotte, NC

Terra Taylor is the best coding instructor I've ever had. She explains the materially clearly and concisely. Her style is very engaging and inspires continual curiosity. Her patience is infinite for those who struggle. She often goes out of her way to personally mentor, tutor and reach out to students maybe on the margins or unsure of themselves. Her good nature and positive attitude make the challenging process of learning to code a pure delight. Her story is incredibly inspiring, and I think she will have a long fruitful career. She will be the catalyst for the success of many future students.

  • Christian Rodier, Computer Programmer at Accelerated Data Systems, Denver, CO
